the formal implementation, compared to the previous draft, the official travel "Interim Provisions" There are eight aspects of the changes, in the end what changes First, adjust the individual application incremental indicators qualifications. Cancel the individual application needs a driver's license restriction indicator, the corresponding conditions are changed to "18 years of age"; highlights hold "Zhejiang residence" "Zhejiang introduction of talent residence" equal treatment personnel on eligibility.The second is tnike air max excellerate 2 hombre o reduce the eligibility criteria to apply incremental business indicators. Reducing the amount of corporate tax starting, expanding the scope of the total corporate tax, and accordingly reduced the amount of investment, the abolition of the investment limit.Former deputies Weinan City, Weinan Hongyuan Automobile Sales Co., Ltd. (Private) chairman Zhang Zhihong girl sex case, the Court upheld by Weinan not a public hearing later, on April 24 to make a judgment of the Court of Final Appeal upheld the ruling: Zhang Zhihong's girl sex behavior constituted the crime and sentenced her to eight years in prison and fined 20,000 yuan; case other four appellants have been sentenced to six years respectively in prison and a fine of 5 years, 5 years, ranging from 4 years.Deputies a hotel girl sexThe 54-year-old Zhang Zhihong, the original fourth deputies Weinan City, Weinan Hongyuan Motor Sales Co., Ltd., which was founded in 1992 to 30,000 yuan up a car sales company, after the development to have 4 4S shop, a The automotive vocational an

d technical schools, and a car rescue service companies, six economic entities, fixed assets of nearly billion, with hundreds of workers.2013, police in the investigation together Weinan, shelter prostitution cases found during, May 25, 2013, after Liu XX, Ma Moumou introduced, passed Leimou, Yang Moumou contact, when the deputies for the city The Zhihong Linwei in a hotel, and Weinan City Economic Development Area with two days of high school girls Liu Jing (a pseudonym) to have sex.In the same year on August 16, Weinan Municipal People's Congress in accordance with the relevant provisions of Weinan Municipal People's Congress Zhang Zhihong stop position. August 17, Zhang Zhihong Weinan City Public Security Bureau Detention Economic Development Bureau.According to insiders revealed that the incident, Liu Jinggang over 13 birthday.This year on January 9, Linwei Court of First Instance hearing the case is not open, the trial lasted five hours. Court of First Instance salomon speedcross 3 cs baratas followed the case against the defendant Zhang Zhihong and five other defendants guilty verdict and fined. Zhang Zhihong and other four defendants refused to accept the court of first instance, appeal to the Weinan in the hospital, another defendant Liu did not appeal.The court finds that the victim is a girl knowingZhang Zhihong counsel raised no evidence Zhihong Liu Jing know or may know the Department of young girls, can not be identified Zhihong constitute girl sex crimes; appellant Liu XX, Yang Moumou, Leimou, Ma Moumou proposed, the first trial of its heavy sentence .Examined, with the victim when Zhihong Liu Jing sexual relations, it is possible to know the true age of the victims, but co-workers Liu XX, Liu (trial defendants did not appeal) to introduce the victim was a junior high school student , which is under 14 years of age, knowing the facts. And the appellant Leimou, Yang Moumou, Ma Moumou victim after seeing first han

d, on the age of the victim from reporting suspicious.Yesterday afternoon, the Hangzhou-control office held a press briefing to release "of the total passenger car Hangzhou regulation Interim Provisions" (hereinafter referred to as the "Interim Provisions"), after a month of investigation, "limited license", "limit line" Specific measures for implementation details settled. In this release of the "Interim Provisions", the biggest bright spot is the incremental adjustment of the individual applicant qualifications indicators. Cancel the individual application needs a driver's license restriction indicators, the corresponding condition was changed to "18 years of age", highlighting the hold "Zhejiang residence" "Zhejiang introduction of talent residence" equal treatment personnel on salomon speedcross 3 cs mujer eligibility . From March 25 released the "Interim Provisions (draft)" to April 9, Hangzhou regulation do by 96520,12345,85460100 duty phone, Bureau of Transportation website email, forum and comments on the district (county, Opinions City) tissue collection, public letters and visits, network views collected, expert meetings and other channels to seek the views of the community and suggested a total of 6761."Interim Provisions" clearly a minibus indicators include incremental index updates and other indicators.
